Posts.Content: Hi Emma, I've been on tamoxifen since December and I can relate to your troubles. I also suffered badly with hot flushes and it woke me up a lot. But I've tried acupuncture on the Dr.advice and can honestly say, it is getting so much better. So far I've had 4 sessions, you are adviced to get 6-8 sessions weekly and see how it goes. But I can barely notice it now and don't wake up as much as before, it's definitely working. Give it a go. regards Jana
Posts.Title: tamoxifen - hot flushes

Posts.Content: Hi guys, is this meet up still going on on 31st? Would like to join you if I can.Â  I think I could benefit to talking to people in the same situation. My treatment is over, but struggling to return to 'normal'...but you know what I mean... X
